      • createLease

        void createLease(Lease lease)
                 throws ServiceFailureException
        Create new Lease in database.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when lease is null.
        ServiceFailureException - when db operation fails.

                 throws ServiceFailureException
        Uploade lease in database by id.

        lease - lease to be updated.

      • findLeaseByCustomer

        java.util.List<Lease> findLeaseByCustomer(Customer customer)
                                          throws ServiceFailureException
        Generate list od leases with specified customer.
        Parameters:
        customer - customer for searching leases.
        Returns:
        list of leases with specified customer.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when customer is null, or customer.getId() is null.
        ServiceFailureException - when db operation fails.

        Throws:
        ServiceFailureException - when db operation fails.
